Module com.example.rubankgui
Package com.example.rubankgui

Class Checking

java.lang.Object
com.example.rubankgui.Account
com.example.rubankgui.Checking
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Account>
Direct Known Subclasses:
CollegeChecking
public class Checking extends Account
Defines a Checking account for a user based on their information and balance.
Author:
Deshna Doshi, Haejin Song

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(Account checking)
      Determines if two accounts have the same holder information.
      Parameters:
      checking - the account to be compared.
      Returns:
      -2 if the account is null, -1 if checking is less than holder, 0 if checking is equal to holder, and 1 if checking is greater than holder.
